name: Telegram-Telegram-Forwarder
description: An python bot to scrape multiple telegram chats/channels and send you in single Telegram Chat/Channel.

from_ids.description: Enter Chat ID's of your Telegram Channels of which you want to monitor posts. Separate multiple values with comma ',' .

to_id.description: Enter a Chat ID of where you'll get all posts/messages.

session_string.description: Use this method in repo to get this.

every_post_caption.description: Enter a Caption for every posts you sent to Telegram in image. Can be your channel username or some emoji.
